snippet: Louis Segna, a 53-year-old resident of the Williamsburg neighborhood, provided myriad details of imaginary incidents like explosions inside a subway tunnel and a person in a van with a pistol.
abstract: Louis Segna of Brooklyn is found guilty in State Supreme Court in Brooklyn for making fake calls to city's 911 system; is convicted on three counts of falsely reporting an incident.
lead_paragraph: Louis Segna, a 53-year-old resident of the Williamsburg neighborhood, provided myriad details of imaginary incidents like explosions inside a subway tunnel and a person in a van with a pistol.

headline.main: Brooklyn Man Is Convicted of Making False 911 Calls
headline.print_headline: Brooklyn Man Is Convicted of Making False 911 Calls
